thread.title: Luxury theatre hotel
thread.title_full: Luxury theatre hotel - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RailwayGirl36
title: Luxury theatre hotel
text:
Luxury hotel but look out for offers as makes this affordable. Staff were excellent and room was great with nice bed, fantastic walk in shower and dressing area making it feel really special. The lighting and furniture in room were definitely touch above!
Room Tip: Go big - deluxe at minimum :-) See more room tips
